channel.title: NYT > Americas
channel.description: Find breaking news, world news & multimedia on the United States, Canada & South America with news from Mexico, Brazil, Colombia, Chile, Argentina, Peru & Venezuela.

item.title: Chávez Ousts U.S. Diplomat on Spying Charge
item.description: Venezuela's government has ordered the expulsion of the American naval attaché at the United States Embassy in Caracas for spying.
item.author: JUAN FORERO

item.title: Clinic Where Coretta King Died Attracts the Desperate
item.description: The founder of the Mexican clinic where Coretta Scott King sought treatment never went to medical school and has a history of fraud allegations against him in the U.S.
item.author: JAMES C. McKINLEY Jr.

item.title: World Briefing: Africa, Americas, Europe and Asia
World Briefing: Asia, Middle East, Americas, Europe and Africa
item.author: SALMAN MASOOD (NYT)

item.title: World Briefing: Europe, Africa, Americas and Asia
Antiwar Campaigner Speaks on Chávez Broadcast
item.description: The Venezuela leader joined Cindy Sheehan to attack President Bush and promised to support her protest against the Iraq war.
item.author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
